sub_title: Helping Dutch Businesses Connect With Their German Audience ✨ Social Media, Influencer Marketing & Content Creation for the German market⚡️
summary:
Experiencing culture barriers first hand, I have made it my mission to bridge the gap between the German and the Dutch culture. 

Born and raised in Germany, I am equipped with German virtues such as punctuality, order and planning mania,. Being refined in the Netherlands, I have adopted some of the typical Dutch characteristics such as a healthy dose of optimism and a bit of „gezelligheid“. The best of both worlds - so to speak!

My work has been dedicated to help Dutch entrepreneurs understand the German market and its consumers. 

I help them by managing and implementing every step from strategy to content creation, execution and community management. 

Want to explore possibilities or just want to say hi? Send me a message :)
